channel.title: AI on bluee :)
channel.description: Recent content in AI on bluee :)

item.title: Causal Criticality of Layers in Chain-of-Thought (CoT) — a Quick Dive
item.description: Late layers matter. A probe into Qwen2-1.5B with activation patching, a logit lens, and targeted ablations found that the mid-to-late layers — especially around layer 24 — often synthesize intermediate chain-of-thought steps into the final answer.

item.title: Before We Hop Onto TRANSFORMERS
item.description: Understanding The Transformer.(You Don’t Wanna Skip This)

item.title: How does ChatGPT answer everything we ever ask
item.description: How Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) helps LLMs give accurate, up-to-date, and grounded answers without hallucinating.

item.title: Got Bored... Tried n8n
item.description: How I automated my job search so I can focus on applying.
